department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
1. Knowledge of Talent Management Theory and Practice: Students will understand the major components of talent management theory by using lecture and paper writing. Students will:
(1) Demonstrate comprehension of complex theoretical constructs in the major talent management disciplines.
(2) Develop awareness of talent management practices. 

2. Critical Thinking and Problem-solving：Students will be able to identify and creatively solve talent management problems. Students will: 
(1) Use case simulations to examine situations that closely model real-life talent evaluating, developing, and retaining.
